main.name: Nathan Patrick
main.bio: Music and tech have been my two passions for the past decade. I’ve recently graduated from Lighthouse Labs web development boot camp, a 3 month full time deep dive into wed dev. It was the most engaging educational endeavour I have ever taken part in and I cant wait to dig into new experiments with app development. Besides tech, I play in touring rock bands and have taken part in battle bots. Keep curious and thanks for your consideration.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

testimonials.text: One man’s garbage is another man person’s good un-garbage.
There’s plenty of other interesting things you can do. Have you ever tried marijuana? Maybe it’s time.
